name: After (itch) (Not Jam)
description:
Made in Godot // Music & SFX made in Renoise // Additional audio editing in Reaper // Art made in GIMP

Main font is Not Jam Pixel 5, available for free under CC0

Audio samples from various sources at Freesound

Palette is Tranquil Fantasy 23 by windfallapples, before processing with lighting and noise.
